channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Opportunities in the Evolving Cannabis Consumption Market
item.description: For investors in the space, the changing cannabis consumption landscape opens challenges and opportunities in product creation, marketing, and targeting new consumer groups.

item.title: Wizz Air bets on unlimited flights for €499 to woo frugal passengers, but there’s a catch
item.description: The ailrine is launching a first-of-its-kind model in Europe, but buyers should beware of the conditions.

item.title: From Sandpiles to Angel Investments
item.description: The presence of power law returns in angel investing, with the potential for significant contributions from a handful of investments, has implications for portfolio construction, investment strategies, and diversification.

item.title: Jamie Dimon wants to hit millionaires with the ‘Buffett Rule’ to tackle national debt
item.description: 'The Buffett Rule' was coined after the Berkshire Hathaway CEO highlighted he pays the same percentage share of income tax as his secretary Debbie Bosanek.

item.title: Book Review: Pause to Think
item.description: This book is direct, delightful, and articulate in suggesting that we take a slow rather than fast approach to getting things thoughtfully done. It touches the minds and hearts of investment professionals.

item.title: The American Dream is collapsing, and it’s knocking billionaires off their pedestals
item.description: Americans are souring on the wealthy, calling them to task amidst surging inequality.

item.title: Is Illiquidity a Blessing in Disguise for Some Investors?
item.description: Rather than running away from illiquidity, investment professionals, investors, and regulators alike should recognize its potential benefits and consider a more balanced approach.

item.title: Mystery of Stonehenge deepens as scientists discover altar stone was hauled 750 kilometers from Scotland: The question is how?
item.description: The Neolithic circle of giant stones has been a source of wonder and mystery for nearly 5,000 years.

item.title: Scenario Planning, Foresight, and the Power of Imagination: Navigating an Uncertain Future
item.description: By fostering resilience through the consideration of various outcomes, investment practitioners can better anticipate and manage the complexities and disruptions that characterize today's dynamic environment.

item.title: Donald Trump’s economic pitch derailed by off-message rants at North Carolina rally
item.description: The former president mixed pledges to slash energy prices and “unleash economic abundance” with familiar off-script tangents on Kamala Harris’ laugh, and President Joe Biden’s son.
